translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 情報収集するっちゅう計画や
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a plan to gather information.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私もそう聞いてるわ。行く？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've heard the same. Shall we go?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ……ちょっと待て。今、何日目だ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Wait a moment. What day is it now?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 13日……ですね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The 13th... isn't it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 出航してからなら8日だが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's been 8 days since we set sail...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うむ、そんな時間はないな。すぐ上陸するぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, we don't have that much time. We'll land immediately.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: って、どこにや。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But, where exactly?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: タンザモンザツリーか、ベズドグ山か……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tanzamonza Tree, or Mount Bezdog...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どっちかにヤマ張って上陸するんか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Are we going to place a bet on one of those and land there?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや。その真ん中くらいでいいだろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No. Somewhere about the middle will do.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うえっ、適当…………
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh, that's so random...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いいんだ！　海はもう飽きた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's fine! I'm tired of the sea already.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さあ上陸だ上陸。さっさと行くぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's land now. Let's hurry up and go.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: は、はいっ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Y-yes...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サンライズ号は再び抜錨し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Sunrise set sail again,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 上陸できそうな地点を探しながら進み始めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: beginning to move forward while searching for a good landing spot.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大陸に向かって、サンライズ号は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Sunrise headed straight toward the continent,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まっすぐ進んでいく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and proceeded straight ahead.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おー、見えてきた見えてきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh, it's coming into view, it's coming into view.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よーし、上陸用意しろ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, prepare to land!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 向こうの様子はどうでしょう？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How does it look over there?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ん……大丈夫、みたい……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm... seems okay...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少なくとも、待ち構えてたりはしないわね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At least, they're not lying in wait or anything.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と、突如として足下が揺れ始めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then suddenly, the ground beneath us began to shake.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わ、わわわ！　地震ですよ、ランス様！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: W-w-whoa! It's an earthquake, Lord Rance!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 海の上なのに地震が来るか、アホ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An earthquake at sea? What an idiot!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ……いけない！　海が……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...This isn't good! The sea...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: せーんちょーーーーーー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Captain------!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 海が、海が無くなってってますぜえええ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The sea, the sea is disappearing!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 来ます！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's coming!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 海滝が、近づいてきてますぜ！！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The sea waterfall is approaching!!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やっべ……！　急げ！　満ち潮が終わるぞ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is bad...! Hurry! The high tide is ending!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そ、総帆開いて！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: F-Fully unfurl the sails!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マリアさん、ヒララエンジンを……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maria, start the Hirara engine...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わ、分かったわ！　ま、間に合うかなぁ……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: O-Okay! I-I wonder if we'll make it in time...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺の記憶より、海が消えるのが速い……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The sea is disappearing faster than I remember...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 間に合うか……！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Will we make it in time...!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地響きのような揺れと、徐々に無くなっていく海に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With tremors like an earthquake and the sea gradually vanishing,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 急きたてられながら、サンライズ号は陸をめがけて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: urged on, the Sunrise headed straight for the land.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 直進していった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It advanced straightforwardly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 急げーーーーーーッ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hurry up------!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 海が、消失していく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The sea is vanishing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どことも知れぬ奈落の底が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The bottomless abyss of an unknown place,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今更のように己の役割を思いだしたかのように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: as if suddenly remembering its own role,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 膨大な水を削り取っていく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: carved away an immense amount of water.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ッ、急いでください！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: P-Please hurry!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスさん達も、いつでも上陸出来るように……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Make sure Rance and the others can land at any moment...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぐっ……だが、間に合うか……！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh... but will we make it in time...!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 間に合わせ、ますっ……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We'll make it just in time...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マリアさん！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maria!

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It advanced straightforwardly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 急げーーーーーーッ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hurry up------!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 海が、消失していく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The sea is vanishing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どことも知れぬ奈落の底が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The bottomless abyss of an unknown place,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今更のように己の役割を思いだしたかのように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: as if suddenly remembering its own role,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 膨大な水を削り取っていく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: carved away an immense amount of water.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ッ、急いでください！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: P-Please hurry!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスさん達も、いつでも上陸出来るように……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Make sure Rance and the others can land at any moment...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぐっ……だが、間に合うか……！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh... but will we make it in time...!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 間に合わせ、ますっ……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We'll make it just in time...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マリアさん！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maria!
